actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide accelerated depreciation for computer equipment placed in service by small businesses.
short_title: Small Business Technology Improvement Act of 2008

summary.text: Small Business Technology Improvement Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow accelerated depreciation of computer or peripheral equipment placed in service by a small business with annual gross receipts not in excess of $7 million.

titles.title: Small Business Technology Improvement Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide accelerated depreciation for computer equipment placed in service by small businesses.
